mapper.select: SELECT member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw FROM member WHERE member_id= #{memberId} AND member_pw=#{memberPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id , member_pw, member_name, member_phone, member_addr, member_email) VALUE (#{memberId},#{memberPw} ,#{memberName} ,#{memberPhone},#{memberAddr} ,#{memberEmail} );
